deckInfo.description: Character-first cards building from characters to compounds to key phrases

conceptGroups.description: Core pattern word and building the most important phrase

cards.back:
[sound:hu1.mp3]

(hū) suddenly, abruptly

Key pattern word in: 忽近忽远, 忽隐忽现...

[sound:jin4.mp3]

(jìn) near, close

Opposite of 远. Used in: 忽近忽远

[sound:yuan3.mp3]

(yuǎn) far, distant

Opposite of 近. Used in: 忽近忽远

[sound:hu_jin_hu_yuan.mp3]

(hū jìn hū yuǎn) suddenly near, suddenly far

Pattern: 忽X忽Y = suddenly X, suddenly Y

conceptGroups.description: Reinforcing the pattern with additional examples

cards.back:
[sound:hu_yin_hu_xian.mp3]

(hū yǐn hū xiàn) suddenly gone, suddenly there

Same pattern as 忽近忽远

[sound:hu_ming_hu_an.mp3]

(hū míng hū àn) suddenly bright, suddenly dark

Same pattern as 忽近忽远

[sound:hu_kuai_hu_man.mp3]

(hū kuài hū màn) suddenly fast, suddenly slow

Same pattern as 忽近忽远

[sound:bu4.mp3]

(bù) not, no

Negation word - used in 不停 (non-stop)

[sound:ting2.mp3]

(tíng) stop, halt

Used in 不停 (non-stop)

[sound:bu_ting.mp3]

(bù tíng) non-stop, continuously

不 + 停 = not + stop = non-stop

conceptGroups.description: Two characters that both mean turning/spinning

cards.back:
[sound:xuan2.mp3]

(xuán) revolve, spin

Used in 旋转 (spinning, rotating)

[sound:zhuan3.mp3]

(zhuǎn) turn, rotate

Used in 旋转 (spinning, rotating)

[sound:xuan_zhuan.mp3]

(xuán zhuǎn) spin, rotate

旋 + 转 = both mean turning/spinning
